messages.title: It's time for change
messages.content: This area has been Labour for as long as anyone can remember - well I think it's now time for a change.

mentions.candidate: I’m your Conservative Parliamentary Candidate for the General Election. I’m also a local Councillor in Tower Hamlets representing Blackwall & Cubitt Town ward on the Isle of Dogs where I live with my wife Jane and our baby Charlie.
mentions.tacticalSituation: On the Council the Conservatives are the official opposition with 9 Councillors. As a result of boundary changes this constituency is now a marginal.

leaflet.personalStatement: This area has been Labour for as long as anyone can remember - well I think it's now time for a change.
leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet makes a case for change in a constituency that has traditionally been Labour, pointing out the tactical situation where the Conservative Party is the official opposition. The leaflet does not outline specific key policies or provide detailed contact information such as an address.
